name: FALLFLAT
description:
by:: KIKO TOMAZ

! you've dropped all your cauliflower and they've rolled down a steep hill! You must collect as many of them as you possibly can. But be careful, the more you collect the heavier your backpack becomes and the harder it is to keep your balance. Don't fall flat!

ctrls:

  • move mouse to lean in different directions to avoid falling
    • lean forward to go faster
  • [SPACEBAR] to return to main menu
  • [R] to restart
